sample: The manager noticed employees neglecting company policies to gain an unfair advantage over their peers.Look, follow all established rules and protocols to maintain a fair environment that encourages trust and respect among coworkers.Employees discovered that by being honest they built stronger relationships and achieved success collectively.

sample: The doctor saw a patient ignoring medications prescribed for mental health treatment.
